946838600779476992.text: Indeed. I just don’t get climate change denialists’ attitude either. Like, ok you refuse to believe in anthropogenic CC, but what’s so bad about looking after our earth and the health of its inhabitants (human, animal and vegetable) anyway?

946839777738813440.text: Because doing so will require inconvenient lifestyle changes and hurt the revenue of lucrative industries, at least in the short term, and few people think past the short term. Easier to deny.

946841159720194048.text: I think that from the inconvenience POV, it’s perceived as more inconvenient than it is in reality, possibly due to the influence of entities for which environmentalism of any description is A Bad Thing.
